casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

May 14, 2010

[Cite as 05/14/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-2110.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2010-0768. US Bank, NA v. Suggs.

Cuyahoga App. No. 94537. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
